long_description: Geax Evolution 29er tire is designed to to be ridden daily, whether riding on downtown streets or gravel paths, and offers a high level of reliability to ensure you keep rolling smoothly. Tough, long-wearing Aramid 3D compound supplies good grip along with cut and puncture resistance. Inverted tread features a smooth center strip for lower rolling resistance; shoulders offer improved traction for cornering or occasional off-road jaunts. 26 tpi casing with steel wire bead.
short_description: Geax Evolution 29er tire is designed to to be ridden daily, whether riding on downtown streets or gravel paths, and offers a high level of reliability to ensure you keep rolling smoothly.
